import React,{useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { Container,Row,Col,Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { BreadCrumb } from '../components/BreadCrumb/BreadCrumb.comp' import tickets from '../../assets/data/dummy-tickets.json' import { MessageHistory } from '../components/message-history/Message.History' import { UpdateTicket } from '../components/updateTicket/UpdateTicket.comp' const ticket = tickets[0] export const Ticket = () => { const [message,setMessgae]=useState("") useEffect(()=>{console.log("use effect")},[message]) const handleOnChange=function(event){ setMessgae(event.target.value) } const handleOnSubmit = function(event) { event.preventDefault() } return (
Subject: {ticket.subject}
Date :{ticket.date}
{ticket.status}
) }
